fields.description:
Need to validate Jenkins Host/Slave configuration for OSx. 

This involves initial Administrative tasks for OSx-based Jenkins slave configuration. Once configured, the slave platform integration will be tested:

1. manual file change
2. manual GitHub commit to sandbox repository
3. automation trigger fired from GitHub to Jenkins 
4. Jenkins launch (trigger) of Build tasks on slave platform: build sandbox project
fields.summary: Validate C.I. sandbox functionality - configure OSx based Jenkins slave platform
fields.environment:
Linux-based Jenkins CI server, OSx-based Jenkins slave platform.
Expecting unknowns.

comments.body: This task is complete. Details in work log.
